mdRecord.dcterms:title: Raison darchitecture antique / extraicte de Victruue, et aultres anciens architecteurs, ; nouuellemēt traduit despaignol en Frācoys: a lutilite de ceulx q[ui] se delectēt en edifices
Sagredo, Diego de. Medidas del romano. French
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Sagredo, Diego de.
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Imprime par Simon de Colines demourant a Paris rue sainct Iehan de Beauuais, a lenseigne du soleil dor
mdRecord.dcterms:description: According to Renouard's Bibl. des éd. de S. de Colines, published between 1526 and 1537.
Handwritten note that the woodcuts have been attributed to Mercure Jollat.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Monogram bookplate of "SSB," Silvain S. Brunschwig. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 285.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture, Classical
Architecture--Early works to 1800
